content: I'm currently in Amsterdam airport, travelling from Estonia to Australia. Nothing changes re. my Backdrop work/play, apart from the timezone, so likely won't be attending any more meetings live. My 2-year-old daughter Sarah had her first ever flight and did awesome!
And a good time back in Australia.
Safe travels @BWPanda (Peter) :pray: :airplane:

Which part of Oz I have friends in Jimboomba and Rockhampton :slight_smile:

I'll be visiting Surfers paradise again next year... can't wait...

Love it in Oz.

Made it to Sydney! Now spending a mandatory two weeks in quarantine in a Sydney apartment (standard practice for any overseas arrivals to Australia). After that we'll be living in Coffs Harbour with my parents.

Nice and not so nice... but needs must.

I did find Sydney good and the whale watching trip was awesome :slight_smile:

Only a 4hr drive from Surfers Paradise... that's literally next door in ozzy terms :slight_smile:

Glad you made it safe to OZ @BWPanda (Peter) :slight_smile: ...it won't be at least until mid-September before I return, but so that I know what to expect, is the quarantine accomodation provided by the government, or does each individual need to make arrangements on their own?

@klonos The letter we got states that the quarantine thing applies to all arrivals from March to 24th June. Whether they'll extend it after that I'm not sure, but maybe you'll be lucky and miss it by Sept... Anyway, it's all paid for and organised by the government. They dicate where you'll stay, all meals provided, but you can usually order things to be delivered (take-away food, groceries, packages from family, etc.) if needed.
